annonstext:
Sustainability is a central part of our strategy. We care deeply about playing fair which is among our company values, so it’s important that we offer a safe workplace with high standards and respect for every individual, as well as a healthy work-life balance. It may be a given, but for us it’s important to state: you will be rewarded fairly and have space for personal pursuits, family life and interests. As a part of our team, you can join our sustainability efforts and actively contribute to making the world a better place.

For a challenging role with an outside in perspective, we’re now looking for a Health and Safety Specialist for our global EHS team within Sandvik Coromant. This is a great opportunity for a networking pro with excellent intercultural skills. 

Your characteristics and result oriented approach are highly valued, but it really matters that you have solid experience of the kind of work we’re presenting. You’ve successfully driven improvements to reduce incidents and implemented a culture of safe behaviors. We need you to walk in the forefront and you’re ready to take us to the next level. The expectations are high! 

So… What about the mission?

To start with, the location for this position is rather flexible between our sites, but a time zone corresponding well to Sweden’s is preferred due to the management situation. Working closely with stakeholder such as HR, production and local EHS-organizations, you set the direction for Sandvik Coromant’s global occupational health, safety and wellbeing activities and take lead in providing objectives and guidelines and to improve current processes and procedures within the area. Building a safety culture is your mantra, and you practice this as you lead the Sandvik Coromant Health and Safety working group and represent us in the similar gathering for the business area Sandvik Machining Solutions’.

This is a truly global role where you need to handle the diversities it brings, and you constantly promote the very best and safest way of working. You support the organization by following up and reporting the progress towards our objectives, and together with HR and local organizations, you support our sites globally in the implementation of health and wellbeing programs and perform internal audits with focus on EHS. During normal circumstances the job includes some international travel. 

Keys for being successful in this position:

	You’re motivated yet patient
	You’re communicative and easily get people on board
	You have a networking personality
	You absolutely thrive when working in a multidisciplinary and multicultural setting
	You’re smooth in your approach, but know when you need to stand up for the cause 
	You’re a team player
	You get things done!

 At Sandvik Coromant, we believe that diversity of experience, perspective and background leads to a better environment for our employees, our business and our customers. We’re looking forward to meeting you!

Application

Send your application no later than April 11th, 2021.  

Read more about Sandvik Coromant and apply by visiting our career site (Job ID:R0025457).  

Contact information                   

For further information about this position, please contact:

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Unionen, +46  TELEPHONENO FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Akademikerföreningen, +46  TELEPHONENO FIRSTNAME LASTNAME-Andrée, Ledarna, +46  TELEPHONENO For more information about the recruitment process, please contact HR Services, +46  TELEPHONENO .
